name: Daily standups
description: Having a daily standup each day helps us prepare to have the best possible day

name: Pairing
description: Pairing helps collaboration and knowledge transfer within the team.

name: Mobbing
description: We've been experimenting with mob programming

name: .NET Core
description: Microsoft has delivered a cross-platform future. New applications should be built with .NET Core by default

name: .NET Framework
description: With the advent of .NET CORE we should not use .NET Framework to build any more products

name: C#
description: We build our software using C#

name: JavaScript
description: Whilst JavaScript is the lingua franca of the web we prefer TypeScript for the benefits of type safety and IDE integrations

name: TypeScript
description: TypeScript provides an advanced type system on top of JavaScript. We prefer this for compile errors rather than runtime.

name: Moq
description: Moq is our default mocking framework and preferred to alternatives such as Rhino Mocks

name: Balsamiq
description: Balsamiq gives us the ability to create quick low-fidelity wireframes to describe workflows
